00057                         {

00061                                 state->files_read++;

00066                                         state->files_sent++;

00072                         // un-comment this line in order to be a sink
00073                         break;

00075 #if VERIFY_FTP_STATE
00076                         printf("%d: FTP DOWNSTREAM\n", lp->id);
00077 #endif
00078 
00079                         ts += tw_rand_exponential(lp->rng, FTP_SEND_TIME);

00081                                         DOWNSTREAM, g_ftp_chunk_size);
00082

00086                         ftp_msg->size = g_ftp_chunk_size;

00091 #endif
00092

00094                         
00095                         state->bytes_sent += g_ftp_chunk_size;
00096 
00097                         break;
00098 
00099                 default:
00100                         tw_error(TW_LOC, "Unknown ftp event type!");
